name: Space Tetrinvaders
description:
Move: Left/Right Arrows
Beam: Left CTRL
Shoot: SPACE
Settings: ESC

Instructions: fill in the outlined squares with blocks to complete each level. The beam can be used to pull a piece down, and the gun can be used to rotate a piece.

Submission for GitHub Game Jam 2018 by Andrew and Tristan

Hybrid between Space Invaders and Tetris
